topics.body:
I just realized something; you know how in america we have a group of old people who think everyone who votes differently is unpatriotic and how we have another group of people that haven't ever experienced actual discrimination and need to fulfill their special snowflake syndrome?(Basically how the tea party is a bunch of old dudes upset that the usa has changed from the 1950's and how sjw are a bunch of whinny teens on the internet)



The way the usa is probably going to wind up eventually getting fixed is that politically people are going to realize that pandering to fringe groups doesn't bring in the votes and thus all the fringe groups are going to commit sudoku.

If you're wondering what I mean by this it's political projections for 2016; it's probably going to be the year fringe groups and so forth commit sudoku cause simply put they can not bring in enough votes and thus everyone's going to stop paying attention to them.  Say like how the large majority of americans support glbt rights?  Well in 2016 it's going to be a non-issue and all the anti-glbt rights groups are just going to go:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/000/126/you_re-doing-it-wrong.jpg!
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a25b3a6368726d07000300#post_53a25b3a6368726d07000300
[bq="Randomosaur"]Dad #1, I'm on my period again.[/bq]
"Time for you to have a new little sister"

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a25d59636872690dc50200#post_53a25d59636872690dc50200
[bq="Randomosaur"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a25d1d6368726d1f380000#post_53a25d1d6368726d1f380000
Uc9 for POTUS 2016.[/bq]
Blackjack and hookers for everyone!


But in all seriousness that's how 2016 is shaping up to be.  It's going to be a severe asskicking cause republicans' election strategy is to solely pander to fringe groups.  It's going to be such a severe asskicking that it's going to leave everyone rethinking the fundamental basis of election strategies.

Tl:dr; of everything going on in politics right now;
Republicans and democrats: We will bring out the votes by pandering to fringe groups
Republicans and democrats post 2016:  We will bring out the votes by pandering to the general public cause damn hillary burned her opponent so hard that their grandchildren are going to be born cremated.

It's probably going to drastically change the usa for the better regardless of what hillary does cause what is probably going to be the biggest long term change is that politicians will pander to the general populace rather than whoever has money.
